item.description:
Green Mountain Club 17th Annual Snowshoe Festival & Winter Party
$8/member, $10 general public
Become a GMC member at the event and receive FREE admission!

8:30 - 3:00 FESTIVAL
- Snowshoe hikes & nature walks (a good variety for all abilities)
- Workshops & Demonstrations (including free snowshoe demos)
- Kids Activities, bonfire, s'mores, cocoa (fun for the whole family!)

3:00 - 5:00 WINTER PARTY
- Live music
- Refreshments, raffle, & prizes
http://www.greenmountainclub.org/news.php?id=197

There is no need to RSVP here, unless you just want to say, I'm going.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: GMC 17th Annual Snowshoe Festival
